COPY playbooks /opt/apb/actions
COPY roles /opt/ansible/roles
RUN rpm -ivh http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/7/x86_64/Packages/e/epel-release-7-11.noarch.rpm && yum -y install python-pip && pip install --no-cache-dir pymssql && yum clean all -y && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN chmod -R g=u /opt/{ansible,apb}
USER apb
